articles.title: Super Bowl gambling surging as states legalize it? You bet - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: ATLANTIC CITY, N.J. (AP) — As legal sports gambling proliferates, the number of Americans betting on the Super Bowl and the total amount they’re wagering is surging — although most of the action is still off the books.
